name: Mobile Biker Stunt Strike: Crazy Clash of Bike-s
name_original: Mobile Biker Stunt Strike: Crazy Clash of Bike-s
description:
Mobile Biker Stunt Strike : Crazy Clash of Bike-s is the No.1 xtreme BMX game with insane and stunts.Bury the competition as you drive through a variety of different tracks while enjoying the realistic bike physics and fast-paced gameplay.
Mobile Biker Stunt Strike : Crazy Clash of Bike-s is easy to pick up but hard to master which will keep you in the zone for hours. Race, jump and crash your way and other mad rivals through the amazing frontier tracks as you master the skills and the physics of motocross in this high speed racing adventure. Here is your chance to step up and prove that you are the most intense and competitive biker!

Game Features:
- different tracks in Career mode, from easy trials to very technical
- Authentic 3D physics and feel good graphics
- Select different bikes unique bikes, ride how you want to ride
